subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Bryan Bickell and Dave Bolland scored 17 seconds apart in the third period to turn a 2-1 deficit into a 3-2 lead for the Blackhawks, who won their second title in four seasons.
snippet: Bryan Bickell and Dave Bolland scored 17 seconds apart in the third period to turn a 2-1 deficit into a 3-2 lead for the Blackhawks, who won their second title in four seasons.
